backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods or state, serving as a placeholder backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report documenting implemented frontend features for the LandingPage Service Areas section, including requirements, affected files, dependencies, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high-level summaries of key frontend files describing application structure, styling, SEO metadata, and the complete LandingPage content.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens (colors, radius, charts, sidebar) using OKLCH values and base background/text styles with light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and defines SEO metadata such as title, description, keywords, and author for Magical Service.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the LandingPage as the sole application view.
frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx: Comprehensive landing page component with navigation, hero, services, Service Areas, testimonials, map embed, footer, and WhatsApp/phone CTAs styled with Tailwind and icon libraries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, integrating with React Query for lifecycle and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider for Internet Identity, handling login, logout, identity persistence, and login status using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Extended global Tailwind CSS with Magical Service brand color tokens (navy blue and WhatsApp), typography defaults, accessibility focus styles, and dark mode support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application bootstrap that creates the root, wires React Query and InternetIdentity providers, and imports global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling class-based dark mode, scanning frontend source files, and extending the theme with CSS-variable-driven OKLCH color tokens, layout/container defaults, border radii, shadows, and accordion animations. It also integrates official plugins for typography, container queries, and animations to support shadcn/ui and modern responsive design.
project_state.json: Project metadata and state definition describing an ICP canister template app (Motoko backend + React/Vite frontend) alongside a Gujarati cleaning-service landing page. It enumerates existing features, versions, and requirements including SEO, Internet Identity auth, typed canister actors, shadcn/ui integration, build tooling, and detailed service-area content.
